about_the_game:
Now you can enjoy the songs from the game “Geometric Sniper – Z” on your computer at any time.

Perfect for studying, working or simply enjoy the sound of your favorite game. Listen directly from your Steam client.

Includes all the original songs from GEOMETRIC SNIPER – Z, specially composed for the game by Caue Lemes, member of the band DONGO DONGO, in 320 kbps MP3 format.

Now you can enjoy the songs from the game “Geometric Sniper – Z” on your computer at any time.

Perfect for studying, working or simply enjoy the sound of your favorite game. Listen directly from your Steam client.

The songs can be directly accessed through the Steam platform or by following the steps below:
... or in the Geometric Sniper – Z Soundtrack folder in the Steam directory: ... \ Steam \ steamapps \ music \ Geometric Sniper – Z Soundtrack.
